LanguageData.MF_EnterStairsDesc: Select pawns and items to move to the connected level.
LanguageData.MF_ConfirmDeleteConnectedLevel: [Dangerous!!!]Deleting the connected level will permanently remove everything on it and any levels branching from it. Are you sure you want to proceed?
LanguageData.MF_AutoTransferToggleDesc: If enabled, the stair will periodically scan for permitted items (within the maximum range specified in the Transfer Policy) and add them to the load list. Pawns will haul them from current level to the connected level automatically.
LanguageData.MF_BuildUpperElevatorDesc: Elevators must be built on the same cell to function. Place a blueprint on the upper level.
LanguageData.MF_BuildLowerElevatorDesc: Elevators must be built on the same cell to function. Place a blueprint on the lower level.
LanguageData.MF_LinkElevatorDesc: Link all elevators on this cell so pawns can move between each other.
LanguageData.MF_PrintStairsToggleDesc: Turn it off to make stairs invisible.
